title: SC EP:333 Bob Gimlin Tribute
itunes:title: SC EP:333 Bob Gimlin Tribute
description:
I will be welcoming Bob Gimlin and Russell Acord to the show. This will be a laid back conversation with Bob Gimlin about his life. I will be asking Bob how Roger Patterson would feel about the Sasquatch subject if he was alive today.

I'll also see if Bob will talk about his time with Evil Kenevil, and about the different adventures he has experienced throughout his life.

We will wrap up the conversation talking with Russell Acord about the International Bigfoot Conference 2017 (September 1-3 in Kennewick, Washington).

 

Check out the IBC website here
